umx

Welcome to getting structural equation modeling done fast.

umx is an R package with one purpose: making Structural Equation Modeling in OpenMx quicker, easier, and more powerful.

It's easy to learn and easy to get print-ready results from models. Sweet huh? Installation is easy (look at the install post below!)
